title: 198 - The Future of the American Church - With Rick McKinley and Bonnie Lewis
description:
The road to 200! Part one of a series of conversations about the future of Christianity and the Church. In Part One, Mike speaks with Rick McKinley of Imago Dei Church in Portland Oregon and speaker and Bible Translator Bonnie Lewis in Austin Texas about how they each see the next 10-20 years of the Church. As always, thanks for listening!
 
Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
